Class EnemyActor

java.lang.Object
engine.GameEntity
engine.actors.Actor
game.actors.EnemyActor
All Implemented Interfaces:
engine.displays.Printable, DeathSubcriber
Direct Known Subclasses:

abstract class that enemy actors inherit from Created by:

    • addBehavior

      public void addBehavior(int priority, engine.actors.Behaviour behaviour)
      Gives the enemy actor the ability to have multiple behaviours
      Parameters:
      priority - the order in which behaviours should execute based on their importance
      behaviour - the behaviour to be used

    • playTurn

      public engine.actions.Action playTurn(engine.actions.ActionList actions, engine.actions.Action lastAction, engine.positions.GameMap map, engine.displays.Display display)
      At each turn, select a valid action to perform.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class engine.actors.Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      the valid action that can be performed in that iteration or null if no valid action is found

    • allowableActions

      public engine.actions.ActionList allowableActions(engine.actors.Actor otherActor, String direction, engine.positions.GameMap map)
      checks for weapons in the other actors inventory and if there are any weapons it returns an attack action for those weapons
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class engine.actors.Actor
      Parameters:
      otherActor - the Actor that might be performing attack
      direction - String representing the direction of the other Actor
      map - current GameMap
      Returns:
      ActionList actions.

    • notifyDeath

      public void notifyDeath()
      prompt operations on enemy once death of the actor it subscribes to happens.
      Specified by:
      notifyDeath in interface DeathSubcriber

    • resetEnemy

      public void resetEnemy()
      perform operation to enemy. Execution may vary depending on implemetation.
